{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer-C2(UN)1.0-L.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid{{!}}2872&model{{!!}}Archer+C2 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C2_v1.x |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 18, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_C2_v1.x |wlclass = AC750 |series = Archer C2 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C2 |icid = 8853A-C2 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FVSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/18/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00KATWRIY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610E;MT7610EN; |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per ''TP-LINK'''s code tarball, this device to be using MT7620A + MT7610E. :The source code is the same as for [[TP-LINK Archer C20i]], the only difference in kernel configuration being the ethernet switch options.
"2050500428" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The switch used seems to be RTL8367RD / RTL8367RB. "2050500500" is silkscreened on the [https://i.imgur.com/3d6Jpmw.png main] [https://i.imgur.com/yYfY7oD.jpg board v1.1]
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Archer_C2/index.htm Firmware Interface] | [http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=Archer+C2&version=V1 Downloads] | [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/document/Archer_C2_V1_User_Guide_1910010993.pdf User Guide] :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/gpl-code.html ''TP-LINK'''s GPL Code Center] (w/ [http://static.tp-link.com/resources/gpl/GPL_ArcherC2v1.tar.gz current source release])
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery caption="from TP-LINK"> File:Archer-C2(UN)1.0-A.jpg| File:Archer-C2(UN)1.0-L.jpg| File:Archer-C2(UN)1.0-B.jpg| File:ArcherC2(UN)1.0-Box.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_archer_c2_ac750 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/archer_c2_ac750 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=52625 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Notes== ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a ''TP-LINK'' T120150-2B1.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = TP-LINK |model = T120150-2B1 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.3 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=medium, horiz. |countrymanuf = China }}
